channel.title: -----Codex Development Crew----- Alot of admin/mod/coding positions
channel.description:
Hi everyone. i am giving codex online anyother go. I need a whole new development team. This will consist of: Coders, Forum Workers, Website makers, IRC Server Technician (must know what irc is, Have Exp with it and be Familiar with the program unrealIRCd (www.unrealircd.com) and alot more jobs on offer.
Please vote in the Poll which forum software i should go with, phpbb 2, phpbb 3 or smf.
The jobs on on offer:
[b]###Server Coders###[/b] -[b]Zenadix [/b] -[b]the angel of death[/b] -[b]t x [/b] Server coders must: A) Have a source produced, B) know alot about C++, visual basic and C#. To apply, Copy this code: [code]Username: Source Produced: Link to Source: Some Work (IE, Tuts): Online Time: [/code]
[b]###Forum Crew & Tech###[/b] -Admin [b]fr33sc4p3[/b] -Mod [b]Shadow[/b] -Forum services Open -Worker Open You need exp in smf forums and/or phpbb. You will be required to help maintain the forums while i am away. I am currently in the middle of moving house.
[b]###Website Coder/Maker###[/b] -Open -Open -Open website coder/maker will be required to make the website better. IE: Adding runescape app to website. We have taken that off as we are totaly re-making every single page down to the client.
[b]###IRC Server Tech & Coder###[/b] -Head of IRC Open -IRC Tech Open -IRC worker Open IRC Server Tech and coders will need to help me make the IRC server. As i am just begining to explore The IRC server i need some help. The Head of IRC will have [b] FULL [/b] IRCop permissions, IRC tech will have [b] most [/b] permissions and IRC worker will be a IRCco-op. So, this is one of our post important roles.
[b]###Helpers###[/b] -Open -Open Helper will basicly be like a secretary, Will do all jobs there is A) Someone is not pulling weight, B) Would like to do all of the above.
The website is www.codexonline.info. If you would like any more info, please email me at: ikick@codexonline.info Or Add me on MSN: ikick.codex@gmail.com
To apply for a job up there, (apart from server coder) please use this layout: [code]Username: Have you been on the Codex Crew before: Job position wanted: Do you have Exp: Are you member of any other development at the moment:[/code]
Thanks everyone ikick

item.title: -----Codex Development Crew----- Alot of admin/mod/coding positions
item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:42, topic:108651”]Hey Ikick, can you make me Global Mod and Head Of WebDesign like I was before the hack?

~ Olan14 (Aka [size=5pt]~ Super[/size][/quote]

No.

If you need a very good java coder, I’m your man, I can code reasonably in C but almost all of my experience lies in java:

Code: Username: Yppman Source Produced: My server, not released though. Link to Source: N/A, See above. Some Work (IE, Tuts): Made a few tuts a while ago, either deleted now or I've just forgotten links. Online Time: Server: 24/7 && Mopar forums: 4hrs/day?
welcome, please sign up at forums.
username: Blood Shed Have you been on the Codex Crew before: No. Job position wanted: Forum services Do you have Exp: Yes, i'm a mod on Kingdom Of RP Forums, and I own an SMF For Free site. Are you member of any other development at the moment: My own

Welcome, sign up at forums,

Username: Legend Have you been on the Codex Crew before: no sir Job position wanted: Head Of IRC Do you have Exp: Hell yeah, Worked for SeersIRC, as helpop, had own 3 channels. Are you member of any other development at the moment: None that I know off beside helping friend code now and then.

Note* Used Swift, and mIRC before…


Welcome, please sign up at forums
Username: Tico135 Have you been on the Codex Crew before: Nope, hoping to be now Job position wanted: Helper / Moderate Forums, Site banner, etc. Do you have Exp: Well I would for Moderating forums but the site was closed . Pixel quite a bit. Are you member of any other development at the moment: Nope
Welcome. Please all, sign up at forums: www.codexonline.info/smf Thanks.

Read full topic

I would love to help with this project in every way I can.
